chefStats

Source: vignettes/chefStats.Rmd
chefStats.Rmd

Introcution to chefStats

When making an AMNOG analysis using chef, you need to pass one or more summarization/inference functions to each endpoint.

The chefStats package makes that easier by

  • Providing a collection of fast, validated functions that can be dropped into chef-pipelines and “just work”
  • Guiding the creation of new (validated) functions if you need one that doesn’t yet exist (use_chefStats())

Developed by Matthew David Phelps, Nicolai Skov Johnsen, Henrik Sparre Spiegelhauer, ABIU (Anders Bilgrau), Simon Clancy, Christian Haargaard Olsen.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
